guide.title: Usage Guide
guide.tip1: Create a research topic to conduct user interviews using AI
guide.tip2: Click on a card to view interview subjects, content, and full reports

guide.title: Usage Guide
guide.tip1: Add more interview subjects to gain more comprehensive insights
guide.tip2: Select individual interviews one by one, or use "Start All Interviews" to begin in batch
guide.tip3: Generate reports at any time during interviews, or generate a final report after all interviews are completed

ReportDialog.completeMessage: The report has been generated. Click the button below to view the full report.
ReportDialog.waitMessage: Generating research report, please do not close this window. You will be notified when the generation is complete.

ShareReplayButton.title: Generate Replay Share Link
ShareReplayButton.description: This will generate a replay share link. Others can access a replay of this conversation through this link. Do you want to continue?
ShareReplayButton.generatingMessage: Generating replay share link, please wait...
ShareReplayButton.successMessage: Replay share link has been generated. Others can access the conversation replay through this link:
ShareReplayButton.openInstructions: You can also click the "Open" button below to view in a new tab.
ShareReplayButton.errorMessage: Failed to create replay share link, please try again later

ScoutPage.title: Find Target Users

hints.title: Usage Tips:
hints.tip1: More specific descriptions lead to more accurate user matches
hints.tip2: Include users' interests, behaviors, consumption habits, etc.
hints.tip3: AI will automatically search and summarize the most suitable target user personas
hints.tip4: Results will automatically be added to the
